page.title: 20GRAND UNION CANAL & R THAMES
page.content: The rural greenery alongside this section of canal contrasts sharply with the busy M4 motorway, Piccadilly tube line, Heathrow Airport flight path (which all cross it) and the industrial estate. The canal is little used by commercial traffic, but a few painted longboats and small leisure craft travel up and down from{Brentford Marina. Joggers, cyclists, children on BMX bikes, walkers and dog owners all use the attractive towpath. The river, passing{Kew Bridge, Kew} {Gardens}and{Brentford Ait,}is also used mainly by leisure craft, boats of tourists, rowers and canoeists. River Police patrols and barges clearing rubbish are about the only functional users.{Pollution}has been reduced and fish are returning,but the stretch remains bare and quiet.
